scripts.build:react/core: npm --prefix ../package/react/core run build && echo 'âœ… [react/core] build completed'
scripts.build:react/utils: npm --prefix ../package/react/utils run build && echo 'âœ… [react/utils] build completed'
scripts.watch:react/core: echo 'ðŸ“¦ Installing [react/core]...' && npm --prefix ../package/react/core install && echo 'ðŸ“¡ Watching [react/core]...' && chokidar "../package/react/core/src/**/*" "../package/react/core/package.json" --initial --verbose --debounce 500 -c "npm run build:react/core"
scripts.watch:react/utils: echo 'ðŸ“¦ Installing [react/utils]...' && npm --prefix ../package/react/utils install && echo 'ðŸ“¡ Watching [react/utils]...' && chokidar "../package/react/utils/src/**/*" "../package/react/utils/package.json" --initial --verbose --debounce 500 -c "npm run build:react/utils"
scripts.dev:watch: npm i && node ../script/dev.setup.mjs && concurrently -n playground,core,utils -c green,cyan,magenta "npm run dev" "npm run watch:react/core"
